provenance._fulltext: A 15-year-old female was last seen at York at 2025-11-21T03:58:19.590949+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to meet a friend. Within 11 hours of disappearance, movement cues direct travel from the residence or pick-up point to a secondary indoor location (offender's home, vacant building) or nearby outdoor area (field, woods, park) suggest travel northbound along I-264. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near York, Virginia. Around 7 hours later, a caregiver reported someone matching the description (15-year-old female, wearing light blue t-shirt with cartoon character, navy school uniform pants, gray skate shoes) near Norton.
